entry.title: Kraken’s Powell: Reddit Should Offer ‘Redemption Path’ for Community Points
entry.summary: Kraken co-founder Jesse Powell offered several suggestions following Reddit’s “sunsetting” of its crypto-powered Community Points.

entry.title: SUI Hits All-Time Low, Foundation Addresses 'Unfounded' Token Manipulation Claims
entry.summary: Amid calls from regulators in South Korea that they would investigate manipulation claims around the SUI token, the project's Foundation has called the statements "materially false" and "unfounded."

entry.title: Louvre Augmented Reality Exhibit With Snapchat Uncovers Ancient Egypt
entry.summary: Beginning Wednesday, the Louvre's "Egypt Augmented" exhibition offers a new way to learn about Ancient Egypt in partnership with Snap.

entry.title: Roblox Debunks 'Inaccurate' XRP Support Claims, Says Crypto Payments Not Allowed
entry.summary: Is Roblox adding support for XRP, the token used by Ripple? Nope. Despite rapidly spreading claims, the gaming platform says it's false.

entry.title: East Meets West: Baidu's New Ernie 4.0 Chatbot Embodies China's Growing AI Ambitions
entry.summary: As Baidu unveils its upgraded Ernie 4.0 and Alibaba goes open for the enterprise, China's AI landscape may mirror America's.

entry.title: Bitcoin Metaverse Token Pre-Sale From ‘Life Beyond’ Team Raises $3.5M
entry.summary: The Animoca Brands subsidiary’s metaverse ambitions are backed by several investors, including Gamefi Ventures and Animoca Ventures.

entry.title: Gucci Cosmos Showcases Fashion Brand's Legacy With Head-Turning Tech
entry.summary: Currently in London, the Gucci Cosmos exhibition pairs the history of innovative tech with key moments from the luxury giant's own rich past.

entry.title: Canadian Citizens In This City Have Lost $22.5 Million to Crypto Scams
entry.summary: One survey found a third of crypto-holding Canadians reported being victims of crypto scams.

entry.title: FTX Promised $100M to Maker of SBF's Favorite Game 'League of Legends'
entry.summary: FTX inked a massive sponsorship deal with League of Legends studio Riot Games before going bankrupt, but much of it may remain unpaid.

entry.title: Crypties 2023 Nominees Revealed: Vote for Crypto's Top Projects and Creators
entry.summary: Claim your free Crypties voting pass and cast your ballot to help choose this year’s most exciting crypto and emerging tech creators.

entry.title: Blending Tech and Tunes, $4 Million Riffusion Raise Lights Up AI Music Scene
entry.summary: As society grapples with the role of AI in the arts, Riffusion stands at the crossroads, exploring the possibilities of AI-generated melodies.

entry.title: Reddit Is Killing Crypto Community Points Tokens—And Holders Are Dumping Their Bags
entry.summary: Reddit is removing its blockchain tokens due to regulatory and "resourcing" concerns, and prices for MOON and BRICK are plunging.

entry.title: God Mode: 9 Things to Watch, Read, and Play Before 'Alan Wake 2'
entry.summary: Remedy's survival horror sequel Alan Wake 2 drops later this month. Start savoring the spooky vibes early with these recommendations.

entry.title: 'A Grand Experiment': Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury Talks Game Economics
entry.summary: How much of Shrapnel's in-game items are tradeable NFTs? Don Norbury, Studio Head at Shrapnel and CTO at game studio NEON, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Shrapnel's approach to game economics, including different game pricing models and how NFT game economies create different challenges for developers.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Using Paraguay Itaipu Dam to Power Its New Facility
entry.summary: Sazmining President Kent Halliburton thinks the surplus of hydroelectic power and low costs could make Paraguary "the new Texas" for Bitcoin miners.

entry.title: SBF Trial Live Updates: Nishad Singh Details Excessive Spending at FTX
entry.summary: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces seven criminal charges related to the dramatic collapse of his crypto empire. Here's the latest on his trial.

entry.title: Trezor Safe 3 and Trezor Keep Metal Unboxing
entry.summary: Trezor has launched the Safe 3, a hardware wallet aimed at "new entrants to crypto," alongside the new Keep Metal recovery seed storage device. We take a first look at what comes in the box.

entry.summary: With staking demand after Ethereum’s latest upgrade drying up, analysts suggest institutions will take up the lead next.

entry.summary: Nicola Sebastiani, who previously worked at Ubisoft and PlayStation, is joining The Sandbox to lead its creator economy push.

The history of wearable tech is an important part of the longstanding connection between the fashion world and the technology sector and in fact extends back to well before those products existed. entry.summary: Perfect for beginner YouTubers, this list includes applications that feature both paid and free versions.

entry.summary: Chief restructuring officer John J. Ray III celebrated the milestone, calling FTX's collapse "the most challenging financial disaster" he has seen.

entry.title: Binance US Says Crypto Deposits Are No Longer FDIC Insured
entry.summary: The updated terms of service for Binance US indicate that users must first convert their dollars to stablecoins or crypto before withdrawing.

entry.title: Can the Bitcoin Lightning Network Disrupt Media Monetization?
entry.summary: Ad rates are declining and subscription models rarely work. Mash and TFTC says the Bitcoin LIghtning Network fixes this.

entry.summary: The Bright Transient Survey bot project can quickly identify supernovae with the help of machine learning.

entry.summary: While the CEO claimed his company’s Bitcoin spot ETF application was only in a better place after Monday’s events, others were skeptical.

entry.summary: His comments come after he called a proposed tax rule changed “unchecked and unlimited tracking on the daily lives of Americans.”

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Exchange Uniswap Adds Fees, Sparks Controversy
entry.summary: A 0.15% fee on front-end interface swaps has some Web3 investors calling it a case of misaligned incentives.

entry.title: Playable Grand Theft Auto on Netflix? Just 'Rumors,' Says Streaming Giant
entry.summary: A new report this week suggests that Netflix may license a Grand Theft Auto game. But the streaming giant isn't fueling the speculation.

entry.title: Tether Freezes Wallets Linked to Terrorist Groups in Israel and Ukraine
entry.summary: Tether has frozen over $835 million in collaboration with governments to date.

entry.summary: With about six and a half months until the next halving event, Bitcoin’s mining difficulty level has just hit a new all-time high.

entry.summary: The event will spotlight 11 startups from the partnership’s incubator program, including GameFi, SocialFi, and AI+Web3 firms.

entry.summary: An exhibition of artist Sougwen Chung's pioneering works, co-created with the use of AI and robots, has just opened in London.

entry.summary: Regulatory woes for the U.K. in Britain continue.

entry.summary: Coinhouse's move aligns with a wider trend of Web3 companies laying off staff due to bearish market conditions.

entry.summary: The Analogue 3D is an aftermarket console that can play original Nintendo 64 cartridges in 4K with Bluetooth wireless controllers.

entry.summary: Cointelegraph edited and eventually deleted the Twitter message announcing that the iShares-Blackrock ETF application had been approved.

entry.summary: Know-your-customer (KYC) requirements are a growing part of Web3, as crypto becomes more integrated with the existing financial system.

entry.summary: Quantum computing has long been touted as a near-existential risk to the crypto industry. Is it?

entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.

entry.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.

entry.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained
entry.summary: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we’ll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.

entry.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison
entry.summary: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.

entry.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.

entry.title: 'There Are No Real Standards': Ready Player Me CEO Timmu Tõke on Building for an Open Gaming Ecosystem
entry.summary: Timmu Tõke, co-founder and CEO of Ready Player Me, joins Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin to discuss the startup's approach to powering avatars that are interoperable across games and metaverse platforms—and what's needed to convince the industry to adopt standards and open up.

entry.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head
entry.summary: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.

entry.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery
entry.summary: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.

entry.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2
entry.summary: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.

entry.title: Decentralize Derivatives Trading with Custom Blockchain
entry.summary: David Gogel of dYdX discusses how the decentralized exchange is building a custom blockchain to fully decentralize derivatives trading. He explained how the new dYdX chain will allow validators to run order books in memory, enabling decentralized order matching at scale. This shift aims to increase security and transparency for traders while maintaining the performance of centralized exchanges.

entry.title: Crypto Accounting Challenges and Opportunities
entry.summary: As crypto matures, accounting and tax regulations are evolving. Amy Kalnoki of Bitwave explains how her company helps crypto companies properly account for digital assets. She notes the importance of flexibility as new crypto assets emerge and regulations change. Stacy Elliott interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.

entry.title: Most Crypto Users Don't Trust Themselves to Keep Their Seed Phrase Safe: Ledger CEO
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Ledger CEO Pascal Gauthier to discuss crypto custody post-FTX, and the hardware wallet manufacturer's controversial Ledger Recover service.

entry.title: India's 1% Crypto Tax Has Been a Nightmare for High-Frequency Traders, Says Shardeum CEO
entry.summary: As India figures out its regulatory approach to the crypto industry, one thing is clear to Shardeum co-founder Nischal Shetty: “If you're a high-frequency trader, you can't afford to lose a percentage every time you sell,” he told Decrypt's Andre Beganski at Messari Mainnet in New York. “That's something that's caused a lot of issues.”

entry.title: Newly Partnered with Visa, Solana Focuses on Reliability
entry.summary: Solana has improved network reliability through upgrades like Quick and local fee markets. It recently partnered with Visa to allow settling transactions in USDC on Solana. This could enable merchants to receive instant payments and save on credit card processing fees. Stacy Elliott spoke with Austin Federa, Head of Strategy for the Solana Foundation, at Messari Mainnet 2023.

entry.title: We Need to Start Thinking About How we Make Crypto Easy to Use: Robinhood Crypto General Manager
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Robinhood Crypto general manager Johann Kerbrat at Messari Mainnet 2023, to talk about the trading platform's crypto wallet, onboarding new users through simplicity, and keeping platform fees sustainable.
